property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: The Eclipse plug-ins for developing and debugging programs in Amzi! Prolog. If you intend to use the command line tools, or if you are running your own copy of Eclipse that was not installed with Amzi!, then the environment variable, AMZI_DIR, should be set and point to a currently installed version of Amzi! core directory (e.g. c:\program files\amzi\apls). In that case AMZI_DIR/bin should be on the PATH as well.

Under Windows, if you do not have a license key you are using the Free Edition. Under Unix, if you have not purchased a license, you are using the Free Edition. The name of the Edition you have installed is displayed when you run the Software. Free - non-distributable, personal development system for evaluation or educational use only (no license key). Student and Student LAN - non-distributable, full-feature development system for educational use only (requires license key). Developer - full-feature development system and distributable runtime for professional and other use (requires license key). Professional - full-feature development system and full-feature distributable runtime for professional and other use (requires license key or is purchased for Unix Platforms). Student LAN Edition Grant of License--Amzi! grants you the right to use the number of copies of the Software specified in the license key in your computing facilities for educational use. If you are a professional, business or government organization, you may use the Software for educational purposes only. You may not redistribute the Amzi! Distributable Runtime or any other part of the Software. If you are an entity, Amzi! grants you the right to designate one individual within your organization to have the right to use the Software in the manner provided above. property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: The Eclipse plug-ins for developing and debugging programs in Amzi! Prolog. The environment variable, AMZI_DIR, must be set and point to a currently installed version of Amzi! version 9.0 or later.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: The Eclipse plug-ins for developing and debugging programs in Amzi! Prolog. If you intend to use the command line tools, or if you are running your own copy of Eclipse that was not installed with Amzi!, then the environment variable, AMZI_DIR, should be set and point to a currently installed version of Amzi! core directory (e.g. c:\program files\amzi\apls). In that case AMZI_DIR/bin should be on the PATH as well.
